articles.title: 7-Day Budget Meal Plan for Under $50 (I Ate This for 3 Months When Money Was Tight)

articles.description: Grocery prices are insane, but you can still eat well on $50/week. This is the exact meal plan I used for 3 months when money was tightâ€”real recipes, real prices, real food that doesn't taste like punishment.
